main event: A Navy pilot tracked an unidentified object below an aircraft while observing radar data at Miramar NAS, California on February 2, 1955.
interesting points: The object was blinding and accelerated intermittently,It descended steadily changing color from white to reddish-brown,The object reached tremendous speeds and left a short vapor trail,The pilot was unable to identify the object due to its swift departure and large size perception,The report concluded insufficient data for proper evaluation.
witness description: Navy pilot with 25 years of experience in Naval Aviation
